original_text: God asks many people to come to him. But he only chooses a few people to be there with him.’
korean_text: 청함을 받은 자는 많되 택함을 입은 자는 적으니라

sentences.original_text: God asks many people to come to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 많은 사람들에게 자신에게 오라고 요청하십니다.

sentences.original_text: But he only chooses a few people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 단지 몇몇 사람들만 선택합니다
